resources.string:
Tip calculation results:

Payment bill: %1$s
Grade bill: %2$s

Total Tip: %3$s, 
Total Bill: %4$s
Copyright © 2024 yehezkiel enrico bangun.\nAll rights reserved.

Calculate Tip is a simple calculator app that helps users quickly and accurately calculate restaurant tips. By entering the total payment and desired tip percentage, users can easily see the total tip amount to be given along with the final bill total. The app is suitable for use in various dining situations, providing convenience and efficiency in calculating tips precisely.
